text: When I notice money boundaries being crossed, I recognize it and choose to set limits and protect my finances instead.
During moments when financial limits feel weak, I notice it and choose to strengthen boundaries and think ahead instead.
When I feel the pull to let others control my money, I notice it and choose to set boundaries and protect finances instead.
I let not being able to set money boundaries prevent me from protecting finances and thinking strategically effectively.
When I notice myself maintaining money boundaries, I recognize it and choose to strengthen those protective patterns.
I see when financial limits need setting, and I choose to establish boundaries and plan ahead instead.
When I feel the urge to let boundaries weaken, I notice it and choose to strengthen limits and think strategically instead.
I let not identifying boundary needs prevent me from setting limits and protecting finances effectively.
When I notice boundary protection working, I recognize it and choose to strengthen those patterns.
